snippet: Google's creation of a class of nonvoting shares that will be issued for employee stock incentive plans, acquisitions and other stock sales will allow the founders, Sergey Brin and Larry Page, to maintain control.
abstract: Google's creation of a class of nonvoting shares that will be issued for employee stock incentive plans, acquisitions and other stock sales will allow the founders, Sergey Brin and Larry Page, to maintain control.

headline.main: New Share Class Gives Google Founders Tighter Control
